issue.title: [CF 663] Something about Dogtags
issue.body:
if used [name(unit="target")] enter to Text Display , TMW can't refresh when you change your target. TMW's problem or Dogtags's problem?
version: r630


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #663 | Raw

comments.body:
TMW's problem. I made a custom [Name] tag for TMW, but because it lies in TMW's tag namespace instead of DogTag-Unit's namespace, it doesn't have the proper event handling.

The reason this tag exists is because it handles all of the name/class detection magic for class coloring, proper capitalization, etc. especially for icon types that don't report unitIDs (like Combat Event icons). I may just end up deleting it, though, since the only way it could ever work properly would either be by copypasting massive amounts of DogTag-Unit directly into TMW, or through dirty, dirty hacks which should never be discussed ever because programmers everywhere would cry for days upon seeing them.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Crisis averted in r670, although I did have to use some hacks. They weren't nearly as bad as what I was imagining I would have to do, thankfully.
